label: Graduate Theory Review
description: Review of concepts from undergraduate music theory, including materials from the common practice period (50xA) and the twentieth century (50xB). Concepts studied include compositional materials and basic form and analysis. May be repeated up to 6 hours in separate terms if topics vary. Credit is not given towards graduate degrees.
courseSectionInformation: May be repeated up to 6 hours in separate terms if topics vary. Credit is not given towards graduate degrees.
